title: Reflections on time
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Giancarlo Lui
brief_description: Introduces small and large units of time, and suggests that perhaps time is motion or life. The second part stresses the fact that we measure time by motion and vice-versa, gicing examples of various clocks. The third part illustrates the vastness of time using the Grand Canyon and the Galaxy of Andromeda.
